product_name: Kelty Light Year XP +20 Sleeping Bag - Women's Regular - 2011 Closeout
long_description: Weekend or weeklong, 3-season adventures call for the women's Kelty Light Year XP +20 sleeping bag. It lets you stay warm and comfortable while traveling light and fast wherever you wander. Shaped comfort and efficiency, this bag features less width at the shoulders and more room at the hips. Light and compressible Climashield(R) XP synthetic insulation retains little moisture and continues to insulate when it gets wet. Diamond ripstop nylon shell; soft polyester microfiber lining; locking full-length zipper; sleeping-pad loops (pad not included). Differentiated drawcords allow quick identification in the dark, making neck or hood adjustments a cinch. Ground-level side seams help keep warm air from escaping. The lightweight Kelty Light Year XP +20 sleeping bag comes with a stuff sack and large storage bag. Closeout.
short_description: Weekend or weeklong, 3-season adventures call for the women's Kelty Light Year XP +20 sleeping bag. It lets you stay warm and comfortable while traveling light and fast wherever you wander.
